subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels’ Albert Pujols became the first player to hit career homers No. 499 and 500 in the same game as he joined 25 other major leaguers who have reached the 500 homer milestone.
snippet: The Los Angeles Angels’ Albert Pujols became the first player to hit career homers No. 499 and 500 in the same game as he joined 25 other major leaguers who have reached the 500 homer milestone.
